title: Learning Tree Adds New IT Certification to Its Award-Winning Federal Acquisition Project Management Training
text:
[October 14, 2015] Learning Tree Adds New IT Certification to Its Award-Winning Federal Acquisition Project Management Training 
Learning Tree (OTCQX: LTRE) has introduced a new, custom-designed FAC-P/PM certification curriculum to provide program and project managers in the U.S. Government with the necessary skills to manage IT-specific investments: FAC-P/PM-IT. 
"The ability to successfully deliver projects and even major programs is the hallmark of a well-managed and capable IT organization. Now Learning Tree offers a complete set of courses to provide federal employees the skills to plan, execute, and deliver IT projects and programs," stated Richard A. Spires , former Chief Information Officer (CIO) of the U.S. Department of Homeland Security and newly appointed Chief Executive Officer (CEO) at Learning Tree . 
Learning Tree's FAC-P/PM-IT 1 curriculum is the first certification program verified by the Federal Acquisition Institute (FAI) to provide U.S. Government program and project management professionals all of the competencies required for the acquisition of IT investments. It fulfills the 15 Technical and 18 Core-Plus Performance Outcomes required by the U.S. Office of Management and Budget (OMB) to achieve certification. 
LEARN MORE about FAC-P/PM & FAC-P/PM-IT Certifications » 
Considering the recently passed Federal Information Technology Acquisition Reform Act (FITARA) , CIOs, IT personnel and acquisition professionals must effectively work within a transparent environment, and employ improved risk management disciplines on all IT investments. 
"The Federal Government has increasingly recognized the importance of having the right skills, processes, and accountabilities to successfully complete their major IT initiatives," said Brian Green, Learning Tree Senior Vice President of Sales & Solution Development . "As the leading IT training provider to the Federal Government, we are proud to offer the first FAC-P/PM-IT certification program verified by the FAI to enhance the skills of U.S. Government personnel and optimize the cost and performance of their most critical programs - helping them deliver projects in-scope, on-time, and on-budget." 
Need #FACPPM certification? @LearningTree is @FAIgov verified and ready to help 
The following courses are for the new FAC-P/PM-IT and award-winning 2 FAC-P/PM certification programs developed by Learning Tree. 
Learning Tree FAC-P/PM-IT & FAC-P/PM Certifications 
FAC-P/PM-IT Certification: Planning and Management - Course U210 - 5 Days Architecture and Design - Course U211 - 4 Days Security, Accessibility and Quality - Course U212 - 4 Days 
FAC-P/PM Entry/Beginner (Level I) Certification: Project Management - Course U156 - 4 Days Acquisition Management - Course U157 - 4 Days Business Management for Government Applications - Course U158 - 4 Days Leadership and Interpersonal Skills - Course U159 - 3 Days 
FAC-P/PM Mid/Journeyman (Level II) Certification: Project/Program Management - Course U160 - 4 Days Acquisition Management - Course U161 - 4 Days Business Management for Government Applications - Course U162 - 4 Days Leadership and Interpersonal Skills - Course U163 - 3 Days 
FAC-P/PM Senior/Expert (Level III) Certification: Program Management - Course U152 - 4 Days Acquisition Management - Course U153 - 4 Days Business Management for Government Applications - Course U154 - 4 Days Leadership and Interpersonal Skills - Course U155 - 3 Days

About Learning Tree International 
Established in 1974, Learning Tree International is a leading provider of IT training to business and government organizations worldwide. Over 2.4 million IT professionals have benefited from Learning Tree's broad proprietary library of 400+ unique courses covering: web development, cyber security, project management, Agile ( News - Alert ) and best practice adoption, operating systems, database administration and programming, networking, cloud computing, software design and development, business intelligence, activity-based intelligence, leadership, management and business skills, and more . Learning Tree's live, intensive, hands-on, instructor-led courses are offered at Learning Tree Education Centers, on-site at client facilities, and live, online using AnyWare™ - Learning Tree's superior, web-based attendance platform. 
Additionally, Learning Tree provides a suite of workforce optimization services, which help business and government organizations to identify skill levels of their IT staff and new hires, determine skill gaps, and define learning paths to enhance the competencies and performance of their IT staff.
